column1: The River City Casino is located in Lemay.

Hancock is the primary school district in Lemay. Hancock enrolls approximately 1600 students. Hancock High School is located at 229 West Ripa Ave. Hancock Middle School is located at 243 West Ripa Ave. Hancock Elementary School  is located at 9101 South Broadway Ave. Hancock Early Childhood Center is located at 9417 South Broadway Ave.
